aws.util module¶

class aws.util.Config[source]¶

Bases: object

Config that acts as a dictionary.

aws.util.execute_command(*cmd, parse_json=False)[source]¶

Execute a command.

Parameters

  • *cmd (str) – Parts of the command.

  • parse_json (bool, optional) – Parse the output as JSON. Defaults to False.

Returns

Output of command.

Return type

str or dict

aws.util.ssh(host, pem, *commands)[source]¶

Execute commands on a host.

Parameters

  • host (str) – Host to execute command on.

  • pem (str) – Path to key to use to login.

  • *commands (list[str]) – Command, which is a list of parts.

Returns

Results of command.

Return type

object
